{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=RE4000 |revision=W |asin=B00KMXUOHY |newegg=9SIAB7A48F2007 |price=89.99 |fcc_date=03/12/2014 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=U-MEDIA |manuf_model=WST-787L |availability=common |type=range extender |fcc_id=Q87-RE4000W |ic_id=3839A-RE4000W |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=C7 |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A;MT7620A, 1315-BMTH, CTPPP801; |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L3206E |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A;MT7620A, 1315-BMTH, CTPPP801; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi2_chip1_model=RT5592;RT5592N, TN6M019A09, 13268TA1; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |stock_os=Linux |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=LinksysExtenderXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^LinksysExtender[0-9]{5}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=96:10:3E |oui_eth=94:10:3E }} {{TagLine|N600 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-RE4000W/}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=re4000w|pid=01t80000003d4t0AAA}} "0500-2141781000" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :A label affixed to the FCC EUT seems to indicate this device :has an internal model of ''WST-787L'' or something like that {{see also|Linksys|U-MEDIA}} {{WiFiCert|WFA53733|03/07/2014}} :The WFA certification indicates this device is using '''Linux'''. ===See also=== [http://www.linksys.com/us/range-extenders/c/wireless-wi-fi-range-extenders/ Wireless Range Extenders]
[[List of Linksys Wireless Devices#Repeaters/Range Extenders|Repeaters/Range Extenders]] *[[Linksys RE1000]] N300 Wi-Fi Range Extender *[[Linksys RE2000]] N600 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender *[[Linksys RE2000 v2]] Wireless-N Range Extender *[[Linksys RE3000W]] N300 Wireless Range Extender *[[Linksys RE4000W]] N600 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender *[[Linksys RE4100W]] N600 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender *[[Linksys RE6500]] AC1200 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender *[[Linksys RE6500HG]] AC1200 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender *[[Linksys RE6700]] AC1200 AMPLIFY Dual-Band Wi-Fi Range Extender __NOTOC__
